articles.author: Shubhayan Bhattacharya
articles.title: Heres The Nifty Target For Next Few Sessions, According To Experts - NDTV Profit
articles.description: Market experts share their top picks across sectors.
articles.content:
As India's benchmark indices rose for six straight weeks, logging the best weekly gains in nearly three years on Friday, market experts expect the momentum will continue.
